sentences.en: The prison sentences will run concurrently.
sentences.cn: 所判的几个刑期合并执行。

sentences.en: The murderer was given three life sentences, to run concurrently.
sentences.cn: 这个杀人犯被判处三项无期徒刑，同时执行。

sentences.en: He was jailed for 33 months to run concurrently with a sentence he is already serving for burglary.
sentences.cn: 他被关进监狱33个月，与因入室行窃已经在服的刑期同期执行。
